sentences.en: Acting professionally is a chancy business.
sentences.cn: 专业表演是有风险的行业。

sentences.en: Babies and the chancy life of a musician do not exactly go together.
sentences.cn: 生儿育女和乐师动荡不定的生活是不合拍的.

sentences.en: If this method of progress seems chancy and wasteful, it has the merit of its faults.
sentences.cn: 如果这种进步的方法好像太碰机会,也太浪费了, 它的缺点也不无利益的功绩.

sentences.en: Invest-ment is becoming a chancy business.
sentences.cn: 投资正变成一项风险事业。

sentences.en: Still, this form of indirect communication and tacit restraint was slow and chancy.
sentences.cn: 不过, 这种间接信息和暗自抑制的方式,毕竟还是太慢,而且也不太确实.

sentences.en: That was a chancy thing to do; you could have been badly injured.
sentences.cn: 那事做起来可真危险, 当时你很有可能会受重伤.

sentences.en: That was a chancy thing to do; you could have been killed.
sentences.cn: 那事做起来可真危险, 当时你很有可能会遇害.

words.tran_cn: 机会，际遇；运气，侥幸；可能性
不确实的；偶然发生的；不安的

trans.tran_en: not certain, or involving a lot of risk
